outputs.output_descr: The project aims to establish a rigorous capacity building and institutional development programme for the TFG as well as for the administrations in Puntland and Somaliland to streamline and strengthen their core functioning; provide targeted interventions to support higher education and training providers so as to strengthen Somali human resource capital in key disciplines and provision of technical assistance for the Transitional Federal Government to support institutions in carrying out their key functions and in setting policies.
1.	Federal and State Governments' capacities to develop and implement policies relative to institutional development and to civil service reform strengthened

donor_name: UNITED STATES AGENCY FOR INTERNATIONAL DEVELOPMENT (USAID)
outputs.output_descr: 4.	Capacities of key government bodies, civil service training and tertiary institutions strengthened through increased use of ICTs
integrating HIV/AIDS into governance programme, addressing governance-related HIV/AIDS issues

project_title: Somali Institutional and Capacity Development Project
